Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Kenya Hatsumura as Forensics officer A  Haruhi Terada as Kyoko Tosaki  Ikuji Nose as Keidai Tosaki  Hiroshi Shirokuma as Hiroshi Tanabe  Haruna Ikezawa as Mika Miura

sections.Situation:
Sonoko, Ran, and Conan are going to a "glamping park", a luxury camping, when they witness a murder.

It is revealed that all of the suspects moved the corpse to another's room and put thing in the corpse. Now Conan needs to investigate who is lying.
sections.People:
- Victim (suffocated)
- 46 years old
- Small company president
- 38 years old
- Keidai's wife

- 44 years old

- Keidai's friend

- Make-up artist
- Keidai's assistant
- Tokyo MPD forensics officer
- Tokyo MPD forensics officer
- Okuhoku Glamping Park visitor
sections.Trivia:
- The series organizer of the well-known anime series Gintama, Akatsuki Yamatoya, writes script for Detective Conan for the first time.
- The poster in the house is about the crime scene in Ibaraki Prefecture from Mysterious Case in a Hot Air Balloon.
- Even after the case was solved, it is unknown why the victim was found in girls' clothes.
- Sonoko is shown to be quite good at fishing.
- Glamping, from the contraction of the words Glamour and Camping is a type of camping with resorts style services and lots of amenities.
